verses.roman:
prabhu lekhā kare yāre--rādhikāra 'gaṇa'
jagatera madhye 'pātra'--sāḍe tina jana

synonyms: prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; lekhā kare—accepts; yāre—whom; rādhikāra gaṇa—as one of the associates of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; jagatera madhye—throughout the whole world; pātra—most confidential devotees; sāḍe tina—three and a half; jana—persons.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu accepted her as having formerly been an associate of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī. In the entire world, three and a half people were His intimate devotees.
